<h3 id="X31775">X(31775) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ANTI-CIRCUMPERP-TANGENTIAL AND HEXYL</h3>
Barycentrics<br>
2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6-(3*b^2-8*b*c+3*c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-2*(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*b*c*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31775) = 3*X(165)+X(10483) = 3*X(165)-X(11827) = 3*X(3576)-X(6284) = 3*X(5434)-X(7982) = 3*X(10202)-2*X(12433) = 3*X(10246)-2*X(15172) = 3*X(15170)-4*X(15178)</b>
<p>
As a point on the Euler line, X(31775) has Shinagawa coefficients (2*R-r, -2*R+3*r)</p>
<p>X(31775) lies on these lines:
{1,11826}, {2,3}, {7,1482}, {8,2096}, {10,2829}, {12,2077}, {35,24466}, {36,15908}, {40,5252}, {63,5690}, {79,5538}, {84,355}, {104,24390}, {165,10483}, {388,10306}, {495,11248}, {496,10269}, {515,5836}, {516,3884}, {517,4292}, {528,5882}, {529,11362}, {950,9940}, {1125,22835}, {1158,5794}, {1259,10942}, {1350,5820}, {1376,6256}, {1385,1387}, {1478,10310}, {1519,17614}, {1770,14110}, {2883,14925}, {2886,5450}, {2894,12773}, {3428,4299}, {3576,6284}, {3868,5844}, {3916,5771}, {4293,22770}, {4297,5842}, {4313,10246}, {4316,30264}, {4324,15931}, {5123,6684}, {5249,5901}, {5270,5537}, {5434,7982}, {5559,7991}, {5587,10270}, {5687,12115}, {5720,6259}, {5732,5832}, {5780,5811}, {5784,5887}, {5787,7171}, {5812,6282}, {5881,30304}, {5885,10122}, {6001,17647}, {6244,9655}, {6253,30503}, {7675,31657}, {7987,23708}, {9581,21164}, {9799,18525}, {9965,12245}, {10039,13528}, {10200,10893}, {10202,12433}, {10247,11036}, {10386,16202}, {10593,26492}, {10609,21740}, {10826,16209}, {10902,15338}, {10957,11012}, {11015,18444}, {11220,28224}, {12678,17857}, {13243,19914}, {15170,15178}, {15325,15866}, {16004,31798}, {16465,24475}, {17768,31806}, {18242,25440}, {20418,24387}, {22758,31419}, {24470,24474}, {25524,26333}, {26086,31659}, {26446,31424}, {28160,31787}</p>
<p>
X(31775) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 11826}, {40, 7354}, {1770, 14110}, {10483, 11827}, {18990, 31777}<br>
X(31775) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (950, 9940), (15171, 1385), (24474, 24470), (31789, 3), (31798, 16004)<br>
X(31775) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 382, 6827), (4, 6904, 6918), (4, 6964, 381)<br>
</p>
